name: [BETA] Pitch Black
authors:
Lurzard: The Beacon slugcat and mod artwork.

Millisec: The Photomaniac slugcat, Lediting, and more to come.

Niko: Night Terror Creature.

URUFUDOGGO: The Beacon's Flashbang storage', The Photomaniac's Electric Detonation, and Photo's Chest Spots sprite.

Spinch: The Photomaniac's Spear crafting.

And a lot more people from #moding-dev in the Official Rain World Discord, YOU made this possible!
description:
Crawl around in the nighttime of a dying world as two new custom campaigns, The Beacon and The Photomaniac!

Make it home safely before the dawn wakes.
Then uncover the hidden secrets of this world and piece together the fractured story.
